channel.title: Pipes on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Pipes on Arrans github.io

item.title: sveinbjornt/Sloth
item.description: Mac app that shows all open files, directories, sockets, pipes and devices in use by all running processes. Nice GUI for lsof.

item.title: slurdge/goeland
item.description: An alternative to rss2email written in golang with many filters
